item.title: Nominated for Author of the Year
item.dc:creator: Koen Verbeeck
item.description: I have the great pleasure to announce that I have been nominated for the “Author of the Year” award at the MSSQLTips website.Â This means however I have to persuade people to vote for me, hence this blog post ðŸ˜‰ You can vote for me at the following URL: http://www.mssqltips.com/MSSQLTipsAuthorVoting.asp Note that you can cast a […]
item.content:encoded:
I have the great pleasure to announce that I have been nominated for the “Author of the Year” award at the MSSQLTips website.Â This means however I have to persuade people to vote for me, hence this blog post

You can vote for me at the following URL:

http://www.mssqltips.com/MSSQLTipsAuthorVoting.asp

Note that you can cast a vote each day until the end of December, so you can vote for me multiple times!
Also, the votes areÂ distinguished by IP address, so you can use your mobile phone to vote even more!

Thanks in advance!
Koen

item.title: Nominated for the Tribal Awards
item.dc:creator: Koen Verbeeck
item.description: Iâ€™ve been notified I am a finalist for the category Best New Voice at the Tribal Awards. These awards are not for some tattoos on your lower back or on your biceps, but rather a collaboration of Simple-Talk and SQLServerCentral to give outstanding commu…
item.content:encoded:
Iâ€™ve been notified I am a finalist for the category Best New Voice at the Tribal Awards. These awards are not for some tattoos on your lower back or on your biceps, but rather a collaboration of Simple-Talk and SQLServerCentral to give outstanding community contributors the chance to receive a round of applause by their fellow peers. Thatâ€™s right, nomination is entirely done by the tech community itself (and I somehow seemed to miss that survey).

I have the incredible honour to have been nominated and apparently so enough time to land me a spot in the finals. Iâ€™d appreciate it if you, dear reader, could find the time to vote. Not only for myself (my ego is already big enough), but for other excellent people as well, such as the fine SQLServerCentral forum dwellers like Gail (who needs a new custome), Paul, Jeff, Grant and others.

Cheers,
Koen
